黎明杀机，多人娱乐向游戏，初次玩游戏被紧张气氛所吸引，独特玩法，在游戏中扮演逃生者体验到于杀手博弈的紧张刺激，扮演杀手在血腥四溅的视角中找寻奄奄一息的逃生者，新手初次接触的话建议和老玩家组队。
扮演杀手需要保持心态中的平静，把握住游戏的节奏，在游戏中把逃生者挂上钩后，如果逃生者没有很明显的救援行动尽量去寻找其他逃生者，让逃生者修理发电机的进度变慢，从而取得游戏的胜利。
扮演逃生者被杀手追杀是不要心慌，地图中充满了机遇可以选择通过第三人称的视交差 来躲避杀手的追击，在杀手没有技能阻碍的前提下加快修电机的节奏，让求生的天平倾向于自己，上钩之后不要挣扎尽量为队友争取时间。
jeu parfait entre ami et meme seul malgré quelque bug pas trop genant ^^

고인물이 고이고 고이다 못해 썩어버린 그런 게임이다.
필자는 현재 630시간 플레이 유저로, 630시간이면 고인물 같겠지만 전혀 아니다.
고인물 측에도 못낀다. 청정수다.
고인물들은 플탐이 기본으로 천시간을 넘어가며, 같이 플레이를 하게 되면 맨탈이 터지거나, 너무 잘해서 소름이 돋는다.
현재 600시간 플레이 하면서 질린적은 없으며, 인성질을 당해도, 맨탈이 터져도 다시 돌아오게 되는 연어 게임이다.
자기가 마조라 맞는 걸 좋아하거나, 신음소리를 듣고 흥분하는 변태면 꼭 사라.
변태에게 강력히 추천하는 게임이다.

恕我直言，这款游戏自己真的不推荐，感觉已经走到尽头了。 各种游戏问题，一开始我win8打不开重装了win10，ok了然后玩了两天连接服务器失败。。还有什么初始化出现错误。 一直进不去，去贴吧看着各种各样问题的解决方法都是各种没办法的，还有很多玩家表示遇到就只能一直尝试进去。。 况且你就算可以玩了，游戏里面人真的很少了。对新手极其不友好，屠夫20 19段这种新手段位，排一局10分钟起，玩着玩着根本就不想玩了。。 所以不建议大家买。。
Очень отличная игра, советую!!!

晦暗恶灵窃窃私语，无边寂静溢满夜空。
深渊之人暗处凝视，丧者钟声悠然回响。
电锯之声由远及近，鸣喘哀嚎逐渐清晰。
童谣歌声坠入梦境，摇篮之曲难以入眠。
电击惨笑心智不再，竖锯面罩重重考验。
陷阱静置等待猎物，厄咒加身希望难寻。
绝处境地燃起篝火，迷途羔羊围坐其间
熬过黑夜即是黎明？毅然赴死便能解脱？
逃生之人不再欣喜，被献祭者放弃挣扎。
终局皆为噩梦一场，无限轮回早已明示：
黑夜之后仍是黑夜，死亡之时绝非解脱。

[h1]The Game after 60 hrs[/h1]

This game is very good if you don't take into consideration the campers, trollers and even cheaters. The dev's don't really do much about this do even if you report which is a bit sad in my opinion.
[b]After 60 hours played on this game i can see why people get very mad about this game and on some instances even quit.[/b]
I would recommend the dev's to pay more attention to the game and fix bugs rather then add cosmetics and new characters.It's better to fix the game and then do that.
比第五人格刺激多了。
When will BHVR go bankrupt? Your game and engineers are both piece of s.h.i.t.
10 домов из 10

鬼ごっこの例えで勘違いしやすいが、evolve並みのガチ対戦ゲー
序盤サバイバーは手に汗握るホラー体験ができること間違いなし
キラーは脳死だと全滅狙えないので不人気気味だけど楽しいよ
マップ暗記、レベリング、アバキャラのアンロックとやること多め
今後３ヶ月毎に１組ずつ新キャラの追加が決定したらしいので
今更とか言わず今すぐ買って１００時間のチュートリアルに挑もう
でも疲れるからと言ってサバイバーばかりやるのはやめようね
超级喜欢这款游戏，希望更多的人来一起和我玩儿！

看！黎明杀机这次又更新啦！天哪新屠夫好恐怖，处决好吓人！怎么还有这么多BUG?卸载反馈一气呵成，算了还是再玩几局吧。黎明杀机太好玩了，我还是等到下一次更新再卸载吧。
       从2016年到2018 年，杀鸡已经2岁了！虽然杀鸡的趣味性十足还有许多丰富多彩的屠夫于求生者，But这游戏的BUG实在是太太太多了！每一次更新杀鸡就会修复一大堆BUG，然后又会增加一大堆BUG， 比如说最近的原地不动BUG，触动了这个BUG后，你不但不能动，而且你必须要拔线才能离开游戏，而且你在2阶段的钩子时，你不用按空格键，它就会自动帮你按，恐怖如斯。
       最后，希望杀鸡越做越好，slay全场！！！
good
这个游戏是真的好玩 强推
완전 꿀잼인데 너잼이에요 사시든가 말든가 하세요 ㅎㅎ
这个平衡改动实在是太差了，连砍人类两大刀，连增强两次屠夫。合着我们以前玩的版本如此不平衡？玩还是会继续玩的，但是这并不代表真香或者支持这个改动，只是实在太爱了，太爱了。
Класссна гра рекомендую

когда-то я любил эту игру и просыпался с мыслью поскорее выполнить новый дейлик.
проходили годы. игра становилась все хуже. сквозь кровь и слезы я принимал каждую новую го.в.няшку, которую разработчики кидали в игроков. в какой-то момент терпение пережало мне горло, мне открылось второе дыхание... и я решил сохранить девственным хотя бы его: я принял решение бросить эту игру.

такое незамысловатое предисловие, в котором многие олды смогут найти себя.

на днях я решил зайти в игру отрочества, чтобы посмотреть, как же там все изменилось? каким еще висцеральным жиром поросла эта красавица?
я надеялся хотя бы на то, что я смогу сыграть матч. но чтобы вы думали? пять раз подряд я попал на вечную загрузку, при чем с разных компьютеров...

в негодовании я закрыл игру. RIP DBD 2016-2018
this game is Gucci :) i swear
煽りがなければいいゲーム
好的游戏会被青睐，一个好的游戏会重视玩家的想法，自他们弄了官方汉化后我就知道这是一款值得的游戏，他们重视中国玩家超出我的想象，我曾今对自己开玩笑说他们会把杨永信加进去，没想到真的加了！这是一款充满冒险刺激的逃生游戏，我非常喜欢，一个重视中国玩家的游戏自然会被中国玩家喜爱
muy buen juego

优秀
挺有意思，

Creo que el juego se está yendo un poco a la mierda. El sistema de emparejamiento es bastante desbalanceado, del mismo modo que siendo rango 20 (el rango mas bajo) me toca con gente de mi mismo rango, también hay ocasiones en las que me toca con gente de rango 10 o 5, es una cosa super bruta. Si ya has jugado antes al juego, dale una oportunidad y si no te gusta, abandonalo (como yo) hasta que haya más contenido o algo te motive a seguir en el juego, pero si eres jugador nuevo, ni toques este juego.

Really enjoying the game right now. There may be complaints, but no matter what you play there will be complaints. Take others opinions into consideration, but don't let that be your deciding factor.

5/5 fun
its good check it out

Este juego es la mayor put.a mierd.a cancerígena de la historia.... con el peor matchmaking de la historia, solo buffan killers y nerfean survivors (y he jugado de sobra con ambos para saber de lo que hablo)

El matchmaking solo os va a juntar con equipos con retraso mental que no reparan, ni te bajan del gancho hasta que estas forcejeando al límite de la muerte para que luego te venga el killer campero en plan: "JAJAJA MÍRAME SOY SUBNOR.MAL Y TE TUNELEO" y te tire al suelo.

Y lo peor de todo es que te da igual el rango 20 que el 15 que el 10 que su put.a madre en bicicleta.

Solo váis a encontrar killers tuneleros con barcaoa y chile y nadie escapa de la muerte, junto a compañeros de equipo que no aportan nada salvo un aumento de la bilis en tu hígado.

Hacéos un favor y no compréis esta put.a mierd.a infecta de juego que aún encima a cada parche funciona peor que antes, una verguenza estando programado en UE que eso lo mueve hasta una calculadora científica.
Bought it on sale ended up being one of my favourite games.
Dead by daylight is an awesome game.... really fun to play with friends
good :D

[h1] Jogo incrível, bons gráficos e terror com os AMIGOS!!! [/h1]

Cara, Dead by Daylight é um dos jogos multiplayers de terror mais incríveis que já joguei, um pouco viciante e paciente, mais o jogo fica melhor ainda jogando com os amigos, dando risadas e sustos juntos é o que eu mais gosto; Recomendo vocês a comprarem o jogo, se você gosta do estilo terror em multiplayer Dead by Daylight é o caso, foi os R$36,99 mais bem gastos da minha vida, bom, por enquanto não encontrei nenhum siquer BUG, e espero não achar, pois o jogo tá TOP demais. E não, o jogo não está morto, os moderadores estão sempre criando personagens e killers novos.

[h1] ▣ Gráficos: [/h1] Bem bonitos, existem 4 opções de gráficos no jogo, BAIXO;MÉDIO;ALTO;ULTRA. O Jogo até que é bem leve, pois tenho um péssimo processador e uma péssima memória RAM. Usa-se mais Placa de vídeo, que foi minha salvação para o jogo rodar. #VALEU1050Ti!! Nota: 9/10

[h1] ▣ Jogabilidade: [/h1] Sem muitos bugs, a cada atualização o jogo vem melhorando trazendo novos conteúdos para não enjoar, e claro, muitos sustos e risadas ao longo da gameplay kkkk. Nota: 9/10

[h1] ▣ DLCs: [/h1] As DLCs do DBD são bem boas, vários killers e sobreviventes bons, e são baratas, a DLC mais cara custa em torno de R$14,49. Eu comprei a DLC do "The Saw Chapter" e não me arrependi, o killer vem me trazendo várias vitórias e deixando minha classificação mais pra baixo. Nota: 10/10

[b] CONTRAS: [/b] A única coisa mais chata que tem nesse jogo são killers campers, sobreviventes que QUITAM de raiva só porque os killers os derrubam, e "HOST" com o criador da sala, na maioria das vezes, a pessoa tem uma internet ruim, assim dando lag na partida, não tecnicamente um lag, mais sim uns [b]"teleports"[/b] no seu personagem. Mais tirando esses fatos, Dead by Daylight é um ótimo jogo. [h1] RECOMENDO!!! [/h1]

Il gioco in se AVVOLTE può anche essere divertente, dando mazzate in giro col killer o sopravvivere con gli amici, eppure resta un gioco fatto coi piedi. I nuovi aggiornamenti? Carini i vestiti, si, ok...ma lo vogliamo veramente migliorare il gioco o inseriamo solo stronzate? Dalla parte del survivor, se hai come killer qualcuno con la motosega al 90% campera intorno al disgraziato di turno senza possibilità di salvarlo...e parlando di camper, i geni di questo gioco hanno deciso che il camp è una strategia *applauso ironico*. Già non ho possiblità di difendermi, non so giocare, e in più devo subirmi un facecamp che non mi fa praticamente giocare la partita? E devo anche sentirmi dire che è una """strategia""" senza possibilità di reportare il killer? Ma stiamo scherzando? Dalla parte del killer invece il discorso botola, che in teoria nella beta potevi chiudere ma non lo hanno più implementato, perchè la gente si è lamentata (di questa stronzata si, della ""strategia" legit no). Poi vabbe una carrellata di bug, hitbox fatta coi sandali e glitch, nonchè la totale assenza di anticheater, che avvolte si possono incontrare. In conclusione compratelo SOLO se giocate tra amici, altrimenti se non avete intenzione di buttare giù tutto il calendario, non compratelo e passatelo oltre.
由第五人格入的游戏，却又因此没在碰过第五人格= =

Admittedly, this game is about as balanced as any 4v1 can be (which is, of course, to say it isn't). However, through its unique variety of characters, perks, and maps, Dead by Daylight still manages to feel fresh with every new round, so it gets a recommend out of me.

I dont often review games but when i do its because i genuinely need to say this: the game is fun as hell, great to pick up and play with friends and fun to play as killer solo, but there is one huge porblem with this game, the sheer toxicity  of the comunity, especially survivor players,at the time of writing this i only have about 3-4 hours to guess, and i balanced it out between survivor matches and killer matches, and whenever i escaped as a survivor my teammates (who are veteran players due to season reset) are so god damned toxic after the game ends its a joke, in 75% of the killer games i played i went against vets that is beat a couple times and others not so but the message i always got off of the vet players usually went like this: "worst killer ever, noob camping hooks and bad at the game, so so sad that he plays" like thats not a joke, thats a a quote from a game i just played (may be wrong but it went along those lines). seriously, this is the veteran playerbase of this game so heres a warning, if you play killer, prepare to getflamed, abused and overall enjoy the game less, however thats not true for all survivor players, i met some rather nice ones and got a couple of gg's opn both sides. Apart from all that nasty buisness, the game is funa dn worth the price tag, dlc not so much due to the amount of dlc not in the base game, but if you want the game w/ dlc i suggest buying in a sale, if not then the base game is worth the price tag

edit: Im re-reviewing this game after getting 90+ hours on it and, i will say, quite a bit of my previous review has changed, specifically the killer aspect and my overall opinion on survivor/killers as a whole, the disconnect between both communities is astounding, as killer mains are often seen as one of two people: meta abusing garbage, or 4fun baby killers who get gen-rushed and teabagged too infinity, ill just say this now, if you play survivor OR killer, i beg you, dont promote toxic behavior or anything of the such, the communities attitudes on both sides just gets worse and worse as the ranks go up, purely because both sides of the spectrum feel hard-done by, if your playing this game for pure satisfaction or and immersive survival experience, your shit out of luck, as 99% of the time the only thing youll be thinking is: why the fuck do i get asshole players like this, there no real chat mute function at the end of the game, theres no real punishment given to players for their shit behavior. Ending my rant/review, if youre thinking of buying this game make sure you are 1 of two things: A chilled out person who responds to hate with a smile and a GG or: A raging toxic mess who screams at the closest thing that annoys them, otherwise i dont see you enjoying the experinece for all too long.

solid 9/10 gameplay wise but the devs need to get their balance teams shit together because the games overall state of balance is the equivalent of a flatlining claudette who forgot to run self care, making it a 7/10

Well what can I say about this masterpiece? 5-7 minute que times are perfect when you want to sit and wait for a match...you know for the momentum of this fast pace game, No need to worry about dcing survivors before a match ;) you get to go back to waiting in que after ether killer or a survivor dc awesome huh? Lets not forget about the helping hands of the staff for their effort in keeping people from cheating or griefing the game with all they have to do is change their steam name to not get banned......Pretty good job so far....

Bought this game two years ago when it was in early access. Put it down due to the horrible balance and overall performance. Came back a month ago to find not much improvement, two years and 5 paid DLC later. Good premise for a game, poor execution. That being said, i still play the game from time to time and do enjoy it. However i cannot recommend it due to connectivity/login issues being a frequent occurrence.

1 an plus tard, toujours le même avis, ce jeu est une pure blague, communauté de toxic qui n'hésite pas à jouer de manière dégueulasse juste parce que quelqu'un les fait courir. Sans compter le nombre d'insulte homophobique, raciste que les devs ne jugent pas bon de bannir. 
La toxicité est toujours approuvée par les développeurs qui ne veulent rien faire contre. Pour ce qui est des MAJ, toujours la même chose, les devs écoutes ceux qui pleurent le plus.
Bref attendez que ce jeu soit gratuit pour le prendre; ne dépensé pas vos sous la dedans, ca en valait la peine avant mais aujourd'hui allé plutôt jouer à un jeu où les développeurs s'intéressent à leur communauté.
